topic.name: 1.1.3 Instant Messaging
topic.info: Instant Messaging in Chatters is simple. Just use the IM command and choose who you want to talk to. After choosing someone to talk to, the CIM windows opens up. CIM is Chatter's special IM client.

related.link: See 1.2.4 (Instant Messenger) for more information about the CIM client.
